content.question: Let <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>h</mi></math> be a continuous function such that <math alttext="the integral from 3 to 7, of, h of x, d x, equals negative 6" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mn>3</mn><mn>7</mn></msubsup><mi>h</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi></mstyle><mo>=</mo><mpadded><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mpadded></math>. What is the value of <math alttext="the integral from 7 to 3, of, open parenthesis, 5 times h of x, plus 2, close parenthesis, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>h</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>?

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
